original_text: Ten cubits was the length of a frame, and a cubit and a half the breadth of each frame.
korean_text: 각 판의 길이는 열 규빗, 너비는 한 규빗 반이며

sentences.original_text: Ten cubits was the length of a frame
and a cubit and a half the breadth of each frame.
sentences.korean_translation: 각 틀의 너비는 한 규빗 반이었습니다.
